SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am52
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am52.model.objectives

Class Objective

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am52.model.objectives.Objective
public class Objective extends Object
Represent an Objective card of the game. It is not part of the Card class hierarchy because the objective cards are not true playing cards (they are not placed on the playing board, they are not drawn from a deck, ecc...), but they represent just a game target that gives points to the player, if the player is able to reach the target at the end of the ame. You can get a list of all possible game objectives by calling the static method getObjectives().

    • Objective

      private Objective(int id, int bonus, PatternFinder finder)
      Instantiate an Objective that gives points based on the specified pattern.
      Parameters:
      id - The numerical identifier of the objective.
      bonus - The bonus point for each pattern found on the playing board.
      finder - The object able to find the pattern on the playing board.

  • Method Details

    • getObjectiveWithId

      public static Objective getObjectiveWithId(int objectiveId)
      Get the objective that has the specified identifier. Each objective has its own numerical identifier.
      Parameters:
      objectiveId - The objective identifier.
      Returns:
      The objective that has the specified identifier.

    • getObjectives

      public static ImmutableList<Objective> getObjectives()
      The game has 16 different Objective cards. This method returns a list of all objective, sorted as reported in the ref. game manual.
      Returns:
      The list of all 16 objectives available in the game.

    • getObjectiveDealer

      public static RandomDealer<Objective> getObjectiveDealer()
      Creates a random dealer that contains all objectives of the game.
      Returns:
      The dealer of with all objectives.

    • getObjectiveDealer

      public static RandomDealer<Objective> getObjectiveDealer(int seed)
      Creates a random dealer that contains all objectives of the game and use an integer seed to instantiate the random generator, thus the dealer is always initialized with its objectives in the same order.
      Parameters:
      seed - The seed used to initialize the random generator.
      Returns:
      The dealer of with all objectives.
